name: Froggerty Arcade
description:
Simply help Froggy across the road while avoiding cars, buses and even tanks! Then over the river by hopping onto a plethora of floating objects like logs and lillipads but watch out for those snakes and hungry crocodiles! Get a top score by grabbing all those points/time bonuses. Oh and keep an eye on that clock cos Froggy doesn’t want to be late home!

FEATURING :

_ Easy, addictive and fun gameplay
_ Eye popping cartoon style graphics
_ Multiple uniquely designed stages to beat
_ Eat the insects for a score boost
_ World froggy ranking leaderboard - Post a score and show off your hopping skills!
_ Super chilled exclusive soundtrack
_ Perfect time killer

CONTROLS

Right hand :
Cursor Keys

Left hand -
W/A/S/D

Pause - ‘Space’ or 'P'

If you enjoy playing Froggerty Arcade then please feel free to drop us a review. We welcome all feedback.

Froggerty Arcade - Hop to it!
